Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Feedback from my teacher was extremely helpful as it was directly related to the subject and the teacher has thorough knowledge on the matter. AI was not very helpful since the feedback was quite general.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: My teacher was much better at explaining and providing me with support while AI was not very supportive.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI is a lot less reliable compared to my professors, whom are knowledgeable in their fields.
